summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HDrywall Repair platform after Select component fixes. All major functionality working correctly including Job Board, Shop, Worker Profiles, Cart, Checkout with Stripe, and Registration flows.

resolved_bugs.issue: Select.Item empty string value issue in Job Board, Shop, and Worker Profiles
resolved_bugs.fix_applied: Changed value='' to value='all' and updated fetch logic
resolved_bugs.verification: All three pages now load without errors and Select components work properly

minor_issues.issue: Occasional click interception by overlay elements during navigation

passed_tests: Backend: All 34 API endpoints working (100% pass rate)
Frontend: Job Board page loads with working Select filters and job listings (3 jobs found)
Frontend: Shop page loads with 12 products and category filter working (7 categories)
Frontend: Worker Profiles page loads with filters working (3 profiles found)
Frontend: Cart functionality - add product, view cart, cart persistence
Frontend: Checkout flow with Stripe - successful redirect to Stripe checkout page
Frontend: Registration form - all fields functional, role selection working
Integration: Add to cart → View cart → Checkout → Stripe redirect flow working
Integration: Product filtering and category selection working across all pages
Integration: Toast notifications working for cart actions

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major pages and functionality working, minor navigation overlay issues)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (Cart, checkout, filtering, and API integration working perfectly)
